name: Tales of the World: Reve Unitia
summary: A tactics RPG for the Nintendo 3DS. Lloyd from Tales of Symphonia, Asbel from Tales of Graces f, Meredy from Tales of Eternia, Jade from Tales of the Abyss, Natalia also from Tales of the Abyss, and Yuri from Tales of Vesperia will make appearances in the game.
